languages.text: Впрочем, охотников частенько поражала странная слепота — ведь среди тех, кого они должны были преследовать, было немало их вчерашних деловых партнеров и приятелей.
However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many former friends and business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.
languages.original_text: Впрочем, охотников частенько поражала странная слепота — ведь среди тех, кого они должны были преследовать, было немало их вчерашних деловых партнеров и приятелей.

traits.locale_text: However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many close friends and yesterday's business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.
However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many close friends and yesterday's business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.
However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many former friends and business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.
However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many former friends and business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.
However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many former friends and business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.

languages.text: 然而，负责追捕冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的巡逻队却时常对猎物睁一只眼闭一只眼。毕竟，负责追捕行商浪人的军官之中，有不少人曾是{mf|他|她}的朋友与商业伙伴。
languages.original_text: However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many former friends and business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.

traits.locale_text: 然而，负责追捕冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的巡逻队却时常对猎物睁一只眼闭一只眼。毕竟，负责追捕行商浪人的军官之中，有不少人曾是{mf|他|她}的朋友与商业伙伴。

languages.text: しかし、奇妙なことにハンター達は頻繁に目が見えなくなることがあった。とどのつまり、彼らの追跡すべき対象となった人々の中には、かつての友やビジネスパートナーが多く含まれていたのだ。
languages.original_text: However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many former friends and business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.

traits.locale_text: しかし、奇妙なことにハンター達は頻繁に目が見えなくなることがあった。とどのつまり、彼らの追跡すべき対象となった人々の中には、かつての友やビジネスパートナーが多く含まれていたのだ。

languages.text: Toutefois, les chasseurs étaient souvent frappés par une étrange cécité. Après tout, il y avait beaucoup d'anciens amis et de partenaires commerciaux parmi les gens qu'ils étaient chargés de poursuivre.
languages.original_text: However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many former friends and business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.

traits.locale_text: Toutefois, les chasseurs étaient souvent frappés par une étrange cécité. Après tout, il y avait beaucoup d'anciens amis et de partenaires commerciaux parmi les gens qu'ils étaient chargés de poursuivre.

languages.text: Sin embargo, los cazadores solían sufrir una ceguera peculiar. Después de todo, entre la gente a la que perseguían solían encontrar antiguos amigos y socios comerciales.
languages.original_text: However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many former friends and business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, los cazadores solían sufrir una ceguera peculiar. Después de todo, entre la gente a la que perseguían solían encontrar antiguos amigos y socios comerciales.

languages.text: Doch die Jäger waren häufig mit einer speziellen Blindheit geschlagen. Schließlich waren unter den Personen, die sie verfolgen sollten, viele frühere Freunde und Geschäftspartner.
languages.original_text: However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many former friends and business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.

traits.locale_text: Doch die Jäger waren häufig mit einer speziellen Blindheit geschlagen. Schließlich waren unter den Personen, die sie verfolgen sollten, viele frühere Freunde und Geschäftspartner.

languages.text: Ancak avcılar bazen durduk yere kör oluveriyordu. Nihayetinde protektora gemilerini avlamaya gönderilenler arasında eski dostlar ve iş ortakları da yok değildi.
languages.original_text: However, the hunters were often struck by a peculiar blindness. After all, there were many former friends and business partners among the people they were sent to pursue.

traits.locale_text: Ancak avcılar bazen durduk yere kör oluveriyordu. Nihayetinde protektora gemilerini avlamaya gönderilenler arasında bazı eski dostlar ve iş ortakları da yok değildi.
